entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,146,974Chapters: 74/?Kudos: 1,148

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

entry.title: Music is like Magic
entry.summary:
Author: Oakfiddle

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,802Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 23

Summary: "Classical musicians thinks they're royalty.", Merlin muttered to himself. “Why don’t you play drones? Or is that too difficult for you, My Lord?”Arthur stood up. The anger made his entire body shake. He wasn't going to stay here and be spoken to in this insulting way!-----Arthur plays the violin. Merlin plays the fiddle. Same instrument, but completely different techniques. How will they be able to get along?AU everyone's a musician.

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,489Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 951

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: A taste of what could have been
entry.summary:
Author: Bollsye

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,389Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 5

Summary: It's the golden age of Camelot, and King Arthur had survived the battle of camalann.Now that things are peaceful for the time being, Arthur desperately wants to take some time to rebuild some old bridges. example being, the one with the druid people.And after finding out Merlin had magic ,three months ago, and slowly coming to terms with it, now definitely seems like a good time to begin slowly driving out the fear of magic in his kingdom. (Which was not going to be easy.)Besides, It might do Merlin some good to be around others like himself.So, after holding a small private meeting for his (hopefully) new allies, The druid chief Iseldir kindly invites King Arthur (and Merlin) to join his clan as they celebrate Beltane, adding, that their great leader "Emrys", a very powerful sorcerer, would be delighted to meet him, and negotiate further on where they stand. Arthur of course, happily accepts for both of them.Only for the progressive moment to be interrupted by Merlin who, no surprises there, had just dropped the wine he was serving with a loud crash.Arthur would have to talk with Merlin about that later.

entry.title: warming someone up from the cold
entry.summary:
Author: foundmyhome

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,234Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 1,021

Summary: Merlin has been alive for a very long time.He is not losing it... But he is on a very meditative journey to become one with a blade of grass when he suddenly wakes up in the sixth century, surrounded by friends he only sort of remembers and a king who isn't a king yet.In other words: My version of a Merlin travels back fix it fic starting in the missing year between seasons 3 and 4.Will add more tags as they become relevant!

entry.title: Losing or gaining control (is sometimes closer to each other than you think)
entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,380Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. But deep friendships, trust, loyalty and love bring them ever closer to their goal.Will Merlin find the control he needs and can Arthur forget his past to open his heart?

entry.title: Unbreakable Chains
entry.summary:
Author: Ireadtoomanybooks

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,306Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Merlin never wanted to come to Camelot. But with his home reduced to ashes and nowhere else to turn, he has no choice but to seek refuge with his uncle, a court physician under King Uther’s rule. All he wants is a quiet life—one of healing, learning, and keeping his strange gifts hidden.But the moment he steps within Camelot’s walls, he feels it. A presence watching. A hunger waiting.Prince Arthur Pendragon is nothing like the noble protector of legends. He is ruthless, possessive, and drawn to Merlin in ways neither of them fully understand. Every time Merlin tries to escape, Arthur is there to catch him—tender, terrifying, and utterly unwilling to let him go.

entry.title: Leaving Camelot
entry.summary:
Author: MyAmisFics

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,091Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 367

Summary: "Speak treason against my uncle again, and I swear you can join yours in exile forever!” Arthur's voice thundered across the throne room. All Merlin had done was address his suspicions of Agravaines betrayal and framing Gaius. He hadn’t even mentioned Morgana, or even Uthers death.“There will not be any reason for banishment, sire. I leave Camelot willingly.”Merlin didn’t bow. Nor did he look back as he walked out of the throneroom, leaving a heartbroken Arthur behind him. After the big wooden doors closed shut, he could hear shouts and disagreements.

entry.title: You were the one to teach me how to use knives: Vol 4
entry.summary:
Author: Obsessedwithfanfiction

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 131,220Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 298

Summary: Morgana's back in Camelot, but she's more alone than ever, having cast a spell that's made everyone forget about her magic. Forced back into the position she was in a year ago, she's determined that she won't feel as hopeless. She's a High Priestess now, and she has her sister firmly in her corner. As more things about the year she missed come to light however, she'll have to grapple with wondering whether she made the right choice- and whether her heart can take any more secrets being revealed.

entry.title: the true physics of all things pathetic
entry.summary:
Author: deniigiq

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,151Chapters: 4/8Kudos: 76

Summary: “I know it sounds ridiculous,” Arthur says. “But I can’t stop thinking about him, Guinevere. It’s like I can feel him. His heart right here.”He lays his palm over his chest and holds it there. On an impulse, Gwen joins him. Arthur lets his hand fall so that hers can spread out over the thin layer of linen over his skin, and that’s when she feels it.Arthur’s heart beats in the usual rhythm, but there is a flutter there, too.No, not just a flutter, a full beat between the others and behind it.Arthur lifts his face to hers, and Gwen has never been more thankful that he cannot see the horror spreading rapidly across her own. (To prevent Arthur's death at the Battle of Camlann, Merlin makes a magical exchange - he gives Arthur his heart in exchange for Arthur's sight. Arthur makes it home, but Merlin doesn't, so Gwen sets out to find him and bring him home, only to discover that Merlin isn't exactly the person she thought him to be.)

entry.title: The Fragility of Innocence
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,621Chapters: 15/27Kudos: 97

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,988Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 130

Summary: Folk magic: Usually simple charms, spells or rituals passed down from person to person or within a community, commonly used for healing, luck, fertility, divination and protection from harm.Folk belief: A broad genre of folklore that is often expressed in narratives, customs, rituals, foodways, proverbs, and rhymes.Merlin's use of charms and cures leads Arthur to believe that Merlin is a sorcerer. Little does Arthur know, Merlin is, in fact, a sorcerer. Either way, he's going to keep the idiot from the pyre.
